Source: having common sense
Do you really think vit, anna university are better than some iits nits and some campus' of bits pilani?
See, that's the thing with India. Ppl think of IITs and NITs as the best clgs in the world. Ik vit shudnt be as top as it is rn, but nirf is based on everything like campus life, academic.
But as someone from Tamil Nadu, I'd say Anna is actually one of the top universities in India and it deserves it's place.
yeah but i fucked that i wont get RV ECE also via that
Ah i see well i think your kcet result should be good enough for rv ece rho
brother manipal has been ranked higher than dtu,nsut and many other colleges that are way more competetive, so do u really think that nirf ranks mean anything
Ik they are better but vit is not a bad option too, it is one among them
96/141 kcet boards 220/300, JEE Mains 90.6, pessat 15xx (cse ai ml)

I'm afraid it cant compete with colleges like those. A person needs to score 99 percentile to get cse in nits dtu etc, for vit on the other hand, pretty much anyone can get into it cause of the category structure as long as they're willing to pay extra.
